enWisdom: Indeed obscene language and vulgarities are not from the morals of Islam

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْفُحْشَ وَالتَّفَحُّشَ لَيْسَا مِنْ خَلَائِقِ الْإِسْلَامِ
enWisdom: Indeed obscene language and vulgarities are not from the morals of Islam
The practice of the wicked is [using] vulgar speech
The one who listens to obscene speech is a partner of the speaker

Wisdom: سَفَهُكَ عَلَى مَنْ فَوْقَكَ جَهْلٌ مُرْدٍ
enWisdom: Using obscene language with one who is above you is destructive ignorance

Wisdom: سَفَهُكَ عَلَى مَنْ دُونَكَ جَهْلٌ مُزْرٍ
enWisdom: Using obscene language with one who is below you is abasing ignorance
Doing evil is a [means of] revilement
One whose intellect is weak has bad oratory
An honourable person never uses obscene language, ever

Wisdom: لَا تُسِئِ اللَّفْظَ وَإِنْ ضَاقَ عَلَيْكَ الْجَوَابُ
enWisdom: Do not use harsh words [or foul language] even if you are unable to reply
There is none more shameless than the one who utters obscenities
